name: arabic-pdf-translator
description: Arabic PDF OCR and translation pipeline with dual-mode architecture. Pipeline mode: multi-engine OCR (EasyOCR + Tesseract + PaddleOCR) with 7-stage Arabic-tuned preprocessing, 4-method ensemble translation (Claude, Google Cloud, DeepL, OpenAI), and quality evaluation with Claude-as-judge arbitration. Native mode: Claude vision + translation fallback when Python pipeline is unavailable. Automatically selects the best available mode.
